item.title: From 1.0.x
item.description: Migrating from 1.0.x to 1.1.x # This guide helps you update your code from Fixture Monkey 1.0.x to 1.1.x. We’ve made several improvements to make the library easier to use while maintaining backward compatibility where possible. Major Changes at a Glance # Better handling of Kotlin types Separate APIs for Java and Kotlin Simpler way to handle abstract types and interfaces Kotlin Type Handling Improvements # What Changed # Before (1.
